import { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { API } from './config/api'; function TransactionCard({props}){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const form = { status:"approve", } console.log(props.id) const dataApprove= (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(form) } const dataCancel=async()=>{ try { await API.delete(`/transaction/${props.id}`); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } return( <> 1 {props.fullName} {props.trip.tittle} {props.attachment} {props.status}

Booking

{props.trip.tittle}

Date Trip

{props.trip.dateTrip}

Duration

{props.trip.day} Day {props.trip.night} Night

{props.status}

Accomodation

{props.trip.accomodation}

Transporartion

{props.trip.transportation}

No Full Name Phone
1 {} {}
Qty:{props.counterQty}
Total:Rp.{props.total}
) } export default TransactionCard
